features: Pretty Sharpe From Right Out of The Box: Japanese Meat Cleaver Butcher Knife, Through Precision Forging, the Metal Organization Becomes Dense During the forging Process, and its Physical Properties are Better, Sharp, and Durable. Hand-forged to Make the Blades Even Harder and Unique Aesthetic, Rockwell Hardness: 56±2 Hrc, Stays Sharp for a Long Time and is Easy to Sharpen, Suitable for Professional Chefs More Suitable for Home Use.

All Purpose Kitchen knife: This Japanese Meat Knife That Combines the Chinese Cleaver Knife, Which is Designed to be a Multipurpose Knife for Meat Slicer and Greens. The Wider Blade Design can be Used to Handle a Wide Variety of Foods, the Arc-Shaped Blade Design Reduces the Resistance to Pressing Down, and the Sharp Blade can Cut Through any Ingredient Quickly. If You Are Looking for an All-Purpose Kitchen Chopping Knife, This Huusk High-Carbon Steel knife is an Excellent Choice.

Natural Pattern Wood Handle: Ergonomic Pakka Wood Handle, Comfortable to Grip and Easy to Control. Each Japanese Cleaver Chef knife Feels Like An Extension of Your Hand While Using It. Natural Birch Wood With Polymer Resin is Pressed Under High Pressure to Make The Knife Handle Dense, Durable, Non-Slip, and Moisture-Proof. The Handle Fits Snugly Into The Blade In One Piece, So You Never Have to Worry About The Handle Breaking.

Unique Kitchen Gift: This High Carbon Steel Meat Cleaver is Not Only Fit for Home Cooking and Chef Beginners but also for Professional Chefs, The Weight of 310g is Suitable for Daily Use. These a Unique Gifts for Birthdays, Weddings, Christmas, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Anniversaries Etc. Each Huusk Knives Comes in a Box, Which is Very Convenient for Gift Giving, Take This Japanese Butcher Knife As a Surprise for Friends Getting Serious about Cooking, and for Yourself.

Knife Care: This High Carbon Steel Kitchen Knife With No Chrome Metal Added is Sharper and Better Than Ordinary Knives, But It Needs Your Careful Care, Keep It Dry After Each Hand Wash and Apply Oil Regularly for Maintenance. As a Professional Knife Manufacturer, Huusk Specializes In Providing High Quality Kitchen Knives. We offer 30 Days Money Back Guarantee and Friendly Customer Service, for More Knife Questions, Please Feel Free to Contact Us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Please remember: high-carbon steel knives are prone to rust. If you are new to high-carbon steel knives, whether you want to buy them for someone else or for yourself, please know this feature of high-carbon steel knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, great price!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a 25 year veteran hands-on chef and my colleague suggested that I should try one of these knives as it was the best purchase he made in a long time. I wanted to use it daily for a few weeks before I reviewed it but I can say now that I agree with my fellow chef 100%, this is a great knife for the price!!! The look of the blade and handle is absolutely beautiful but of course with any knife it's all about the sharpness, ergonomics and durability. It has a great handle with a comfortable grip, the blade came super sharp and retained its sharpness for weeks of daily use on vegetables and meats. As it is a combination of a cleaver and knife it's ultra-versatile and can be used in any kitchen application. It sharpened easily and continues to retain said sharpness during daily use...and it has a great price! I'm happy to have discovered this product and I definitely recommend it to anyone looking to buy an affordable chef's knife!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cuts well, very sharp. I wash it and then store it with olive oil on it. Don't listen to the other idiot who said 2 of them rusted, he must be illiterate.

reviews.reviewerName: Terrible I went back to Gillette as I no longer wanted me head scrapped up
